mapper.insert: insert into tbl_consumer (consumerkey, consumerSecret, userid, callbackurl, appname) values (#{consumerKey}, #{consumerSecret}, #{userId}, #{callbackUrl}, #{appName})
mapper.select: select consumerkey, consumerSecret, userid, to_char(regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS regdate, callbackUrl, appName from tbl_consumer where consumerkey = #{consumerKey}
select consumerkey, consumerSecret, userid, to_char(regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS regdate, callbackUrl, appName from tbl_consumer where userid = #{userId}
